activities: Workiva provides web-based cloud services for corporate financial reporting and is accessible and used by citizens across the globe.  In addition, Workiva employs and utilizes staffing (consultants & contractors) across the world.  In the course of these and other company related activities personal information is collected and/or received.  Personal data received by Workiva in the US from the EU and/or Switzerland that is covered by Workiva’s Safe Harbor self-certification includes: (1) personal data received from EU and/or Swiss potential and/or current customers for processing in accordance with the relevant customer’s instructions and on such customer’s behalf; with respect to this personal data Workiva acts as a data processor for the purposes of conducting the services for the customer; (2) personal data that Workiva receives from its EU and/or Swiss customers as a data controller for purposes of managing customer relationships, managing contracts, tracking payments and ensuring payments, and otherwise maintaining the overall customer relationship; and (3) human resources personal data that Workiva receives in the US from the EU and/or Switzerland is for purposes of maintaining an internal contact directory, managing global business operations, compensation decisions/bonus calculations, employee performance reviews, talent management and succession planning. The human resources personal data received is stored on technology resources and services that can be accessed by other offices of Workiva who may be based outside the United States.
corpofftitle1: Executive Vice President, General Counsel and Secretary
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: On-line, human resource, organizational, client, customer data
recoursemech: At any time, if you believe that Workiva has willingly violated the above Policy, please let us know by sending an email to privacy@workiva.com. Workiva values your trust and will take the appropriate measures to ensure that the Sites and services we provide to you are secure. If you have an unresolved privacy or data use concern that we have not addressed satisfactorily, please contact TRUSTe at https://feedback-form.truste.com/watchdog/request.
